optimizations: Image Optimization: OptimizedImage component with lazy loading enabled
PWA: Service worker with Workbox precaching configured
Code Splitting: Nuxt automatic code splitting enabled
Console Hygiene: Zero inappropriate console statements detected
Lazy Loading: Native lazy loading on all images
Skeleton Screens: Loading states for better perceived performance

failedAudits.title: Eliminate render-blocking resources
failedAudits.description: Resources are blocking the first paint of your page. Consider delivering critical JS/CSS inline and deferring all non-critical JS/styles.

failedAudits.title: Reduce unused JavaScript
failedAudits.description: Reduce unused JavaScript and defer loading scripts until they are required to decrease bytes consumed by network activity.

notes: Static analysis report - Chrome not available in CI environment. All critical optimizations verified through code analysis. Development mode scores are lower due to: no asset minification, no text compression (gzip/brotli), source maps included, Vite client overhead. Run against production build for accurate scores: npm run build && npm run preview
